name: Software Developer for Sustainability Full Curriculum (EQF Level 4)
description: Full curriculum for Software Developer for Sustainability at EQF Level 4
program_learning_outcomes: Apply fundamental digital sustainability principles and methodologies in structured environments
Utilize appropriate tools and technologies to support sustainability objectives in digital contexts
Demonstrate awareness of ethical and environmental implications of digital systems and decisions
Communicate sustainability concepts and practices effectively with diverse stakeholders
Implement basic sustainability improvements in digital systems and processes
Design and develop digital systems with sustainability principles embedded throughout the engineering lifecycle

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Sustainable IT Tools
modules.description: Practical tools for implementing sustainable IT in organizations
learning_outcomes: Recognize digital sustainability approaches in digital transformation for sustainability
Operate effective sustainability principles approaches to solve sustainability problems in organizational sustainability contexts
Use solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Display the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of sustainable it tools decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in sustainable it tools through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Digital Workplace Sustainability
modules.description: Making digital workplaces more sustainable through practical measures
learning_outcomes: Identify sustainability principles to enhance environmental performance
Execute effective sustainability principles approaches to solve sustainability problems for addressing environmental challenges
Demonstrate solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Participate the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of digital workplace sustainability decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in digital workplace sustainability through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Introduction to Green IT in Practice
modules.description: Implementation aspects of basic concepts of environmentally sustainable IT practices
learning_outcomes: Summarize digital sustainability approaches in circular economy applications
Identify how environmental impact reduction strategies contributes to organizational sustainability goals to support sustainable development goals
Appreciate the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of introduction green it practice decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in introduction green it practice through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Energy-Efficient Computing Fundamentals
modules.description: Basic approaches to reducing energy consumption in computing
learning_outcomes: Outline sustainability principles in digital transformation for sustainability
Classify how sustainable technology practices contributes to organizational sustainability goals in circular economy applications
Perform effective digital sustainability approaches approaches to solve sustainability problems in digital transformation for sustainability
Demonstrate solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Acknowledge the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of energy-efficient computing fundamentals decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in energy-efficient computing fundamentals through project-based assessments and practical applications

modules.name: Green IT Workplace Experience
modules.description: Supervised practical experience in sustainable IT environments
learning_outcomes: Illustrate sustainability principles to enhance environmental performance
Operate effective sustainability principles approaches to solve sustainability problems to enhance environmental performance
Use solutions that balance environmental, social, and economic considerations in practical scenarios
Appreciate the ethical considerations and stakeholder impacts of green it workplace experience decisions
Demonstrate proficiency in green it workplace experience through project-based assessments and practical applications
